effect.shortEffect: Raises Attack one stage upon taking damage from a dark move.
effect.full: Whenever a dark-type move hits this Pokémon, its Attack rises one stage. The move is not negated in any way.

description.black-white: Raises Attack when hit by a Dark-type move.
description.black-2-white-2: Raises Attack when hit by a Dark-type move.
description.x-y: Boosts the Attack stat when it’s hit by a Dark-type move.
description.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire: Boosts the Attack stat when it’s hit by a Dark-type move.
description.sun-moon: Being hit by a Dark-type move boosts the Attack stat of the Pokémon, for justice.
description.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: Being hit by a Dark-type move boosts the Attack stat of the Pokémon, for justice.
description.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: Being hit by a Dark-type move boosts the Attack stat of the Pokémon, for justice.
description.sword-shield: Being hit by a Dark-type move boosts the Attack stat of the Pokémon, for justice.
